r.d: The PHP client library provides fast access to documents stored in a Couchbase Server.
r.n: * PCBC-493: Implement subdoc GET_COUNT API. * Update AnalyticsQuery API: removed experimental hostname() method as it derived from cluster config now. * Allow to override default pool connectime idle time with `couchbase.pool.max_idle_time_sec` INI setting. * PCBC-503, PCBC-504: Improve running tests.
